name: CreateProject
description:
Create a new project in the system.

Use this tool to initiate and create a new project effectively. It communicates with the Datadog service to set up the project environment.

parameters.name: project_key
parameters.description: The unique key for the project. Cannot use the value 'CASE'.

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the project to be created. It should be a descriptive string.

parameters.name: project_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the project resource type, which must be 'project'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
